tool_description: Players Stat for Brawlhalla !  By Brawlhalla.fr
name: Brawlhalla Stats
title: Brawlhalla Stats

api_list.name: Ranking
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brawlhalla.p.rapidapi.com/stats.php?region=eu&type=1v1&page=1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brawlhalla.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://brawlhalla.p.rapidapi.com/stats.php?region={region}&type={gamemode}&page={page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brawlhalla.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://brawlhalla.p.rapidapi.com/apiplayer.php?type=1v1&p={playername}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brawlhalla.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
